title: Formulae Pro
blurb: The app if want to study chemistry or maths on the go, or are just a little forgetful with all those important formulas!

title: Analyst
blurb: Want to know more about what your apps do? What version of Android they work best on? Analyst is the tool you want.

title: Messages
blurb: Want an open-source SMS app? This is the one for you!

title: OxBump & CamBump
blurb: Produced in collaboration with Feather & Square, OxBump and CamBump are the definitive guides to rowing in Oxford and Cambridge

title: Queues
blurb: Queues is an innovative twist on the regular to-do app, highlighting important new methods of creating apps using cross-compilation.

title: Schemer
blurb: Schemer was a simple web-app which built reaction profiles for use in chemistry presentations and papers. Unfortunately, Schemer is no longer available.
